String.string: Argons will corrupt anything, even abominations like corpsefiends.
Those things make my horns itch.
Meet {@LinkCreature:78#3006} at the main gate of {@Rgn:78001$$Zulfikar Fortress}.
Kill the {@LinkCreature:48#29#argonomorph corpsefiends} in front of {@Rgn:78001$$Zulfikar Fortress}.
